title: Bike check: Wout van Aert’s 1x equipped Cervélo S5 in the 2023 Tour de France
content:
Wout van Aert can win any stage type at the Tour de France. Most of the time he reaches for the Cervélo S5 aero bike.

Read the full article at Bike check: Wout van Aert’s 1x equipped Cervélo S5 in the 2023 Tour de France on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
